MaiGui
private class MaiGui.AnnCaretListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.swing.event.CaretListener

Keeps track of what extents in the text are highlighted by the user in order to refresh the tag tables, and assigns highlights based on the tag and extent selected.
